roleset.name: to express grief over

example.name: transitive
example.text: The trend toward lower rents may seem surprising given that some communities in New York are bemoaning the loss of favorite local businesses to high rents .
example.arg: the loss of favorite local businesses to high rents

roleset.note: BEMOAN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'bemoan' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from bemoan.01-v predicate notes)
